purgemessage.mods: Only Admins of this group are allowed to purge messages.

leave_setting.on: If I am added to a group, and you are not present, I will leave automatically.
leave_setting.off: Regardless of your presence, I will allow myself to be added to any group
leave_setting.already_on: I will already leave if you're not there
leave_setting.already_off: I will allow myself to be added to any group
leave_setting.help: To make me leave a group when you're not there, /leave on, otherwise, /leave off
